resources.string: How much calories you intake for the last meal?
(How much you intake is how much your virtual pet intake!)

\tThis calorie calculator displays your body condition on the avatar. You may set your height and weight in "Edit" tab at any time, and this will also be the parameters of your avatar. It’s appearance and BMI value tells if you have intake too much today. \n\tThis program also calculates the calories you should intake everyday according to your weight, whcih is the maximum value of the "Stomach" bar. You can reset it at the beginning of a day. By clicking "Feed" button, you can enter the calories you intake at any time, which increases the stomach bar value exactly by the calorie value. If the "Stomach" bar goes maximum, you’ve eaten too much today. By clicking on the avatar, it will has some conversation with you. \n\tPlay with the virtual avatar game and monitor your body condition meanwhile!
